layoutHeader.signInOrCreateAccount: Sign in or create a new account

ticketModal.title: Cool! You have 1 ticket to donate :)
ticketModal.description: You can use to donate to any project

deleteAccountModal.title: Confirm account deletion
deleteAccountModal.description: You will be signed out automatically and receive an account deletion e-mail to proceed with your request.
deleteAccountModal.emailSentDescription: We sent you an e-mail with instructions to delete your account. If you don't receive it, please check your promotions/spam folder.

logoutModal.title: Do you want to sign out?
logoutModal.description: If you want to donate again, you'll need to sign back in.

zeroTicketsModal.title: You have used all your tickets.
zeroTicketsModal.description:
Come back tomorrow for more.

Or subscribe to Clube Ribon and receive 30 extra tickets right now!

firstSection.title: Welcome to Ribon!
firstSection.integrationTitle: {{integrationName}} invited you to use Ribon's app
firstSection.description: Here you earn tickets to donate to social projects for free every day!

secondSection.title: Here at Ribon, everything revolves around doing good!
secondSection.description: Donation tickets give you that power, and you've just received your first one!

thirdSection.title: Before donating your ticket, here's a quick summary...
thirdSection.cardDescription1: Real money, but it's exclusively valid for donations to social projects within Ribon.
thirdSection.cardDescription2: Companies, big donors, and members of the Ribon community fund the tickets with one goal in mind: to change lives for the better through the collective power of donation.
thirdSection.cardDescription3: You earn and accumulate tickets by accessing the app daily.

causesScreen.title: Make your daily donation!

paymentFailedNotification.cardDescription: Redo your subscription to continue enjoying the benefits
paymentFailedNotification.pixTitle: The benefits of the Ribon Club have expired
paymentFailedNotification.pixDescription: Redo your subscription via PIX or switch to a card to continue enjoying the benefits

contributionSection.title: Monthly contribution
contributionSection.description: Donate monthly to your favorite projects

causesScreen.ticketExplanation: Tickets are used to make donations. You get one everyday when you sign in.

noCauses.title: No causes available
noCauses.text: But you can contribute donating in community for a cause

reports.title: Check out the transfer reports
reports.description: Monthly, Ribon transfers the total value of donated tickets to the nonprofits

causesScreen.errorModalText: Unable to donate now, wait for you next donation
causesScreen.unauthorizedModalText: Please, validate your e-mail to ensure your donation arrives safely.

donateScreen.agreementText: By clicking Continue I agree on Ribon’s

postDonationScreen.title: If you want, you can do more

selectTicketsScreen.title: Choose the size of your help

availableArticleScreen.title: A Ribon for you
availableArticleScreen.subtitle: Now you can see what's new at Ribon and good news selected to warm your heart!

giveTicketScreen.title: You have 1 ticket!
giveTicketScreen.subtitle: Every day when you login in Ribon you get a new ticket.
giveTicketScreen.ticketExplanation: Tickets are used to make donations. You get one everyday when you sign in.

giveTicketV2Screen.title: You won 1 ticket!
giveTicketV2Screen.subtitle: Use your ticket to do good!

expiredCouponScreen.subtitle: Either you have already collected this ticket or it has expired.
expiredCouponScreen.button: Go back to the home screen

onboarding.title: Welcome! Here you'll find what's new at Ribon and the good news that we selected to warm your heart.

lockedSection.title: A Ribon for you
lockedSection.subtitle: Donate your ticket to see what's new at Ribon and our selection of good news!

clubTicketsSection.unauthorizedModalText: Please, validate your account to collect your Ribon Club tickets.

validateAccountScreen.title: Validate your account
validateAccountScreen.description: Validate your account created with {{email}} to collect your Ribon Club tickets.
validateAccountScreen.descriptionWithoutEmail: Validate your account to collect your Ribon Club tickets.

aboutTicketsScreen.cardDescription1: Real money, but it's exclusively valid for donations to social projects within Ribon.
aboutTicketsScreen.cardDescription2: Companies, big donors, and members of the Ribon community fund the tickets with one goal in mind: to change lives for the better through the collective power of donation.
aboutTicketsScreen.cardDescription3: You earn and accumulate tickets by accessing the app daily.

cardPaymentInformation.successMessage: You have successfully donated to this cause!

communityAddScreen.title: How does the community increase your {{value}} donation?

supportNonProfitPage.title: Make a direct donation
supportNonProfitPage.tooltipImpactText: The calculations are based on the minimum value needed for the project achieve good results. Ribon’s causes are part of the social moviment “Effective Altruism”, which aim to generate big impact at low cost.

checkoutScreen.monthlyContributionInfo: Your monthly donation will be automatically renewed every month unless canceled at least 24 hours before the billing period. Cancel anytime through the Ribon app settings menu, in “Monthly Contributions”.
checkoutScreen.additionalFeesText: Payment is processed in USD, the amount may vary slightly according to your bank's fees.

pixInstructionsScreen.secondInfo: 2. Select the option to pay with Pix
pixInstructionsScreen.pixReceiverText: Your Pix will go to Stripe, the platform that processes Ribon payments.
pixInstructionsScreen.pixAfterPayment: After payment, confirmation may take a few minutes. Return to the home screen and continue using the app until the club benefits are unlocked.

cancelSubscriptionModal.title: Cancel subscription
cancelSubscriptionModal.description: To complete the process, please confirm the subscription cancellation via the email we will send to you.

checkoutScreen.title: Payment of
checkoutScreen.pix: Por PIX, os benefícios duram 30 dias. Após esse período, refaça a assinatura para manter os benefícios.

clubContributionDoneScreen.title: Welcome!
clubContributionDoneScreen.description: Now you’re part of Ribon Club

clubScreen.subtitle: Cancel any plan anytime you want!
clubScreen.userSupportBannerDescription: If you want to make an even bigger donation, please contact our team directly :)

benefitsSection.title: With Ribon Club, you can donate and help much more!
benefitsSection.firstBenefitDescription: Up to 20 extra tickets every day
benefitsSection.secondBenefitDescription: Up to 60 extra tickets to use now
benefitsSection.thirdBenefitDescription: Donating warms the heart. More tickets, more you help!

depoimentsSection.title: What they say about us
depoimentsSection.firstDepoimentDescription: I donate with Ribon because I recognize the importance of donating effectively, and since Ribon has effective altruism as its philosophy, it's a match. Being able to see my impact is extremely gratifying, to the point where I want to put in real money as much as possible.
depoimentsSection.secondDepoimentDescription: Donating makes us feel good. As we go through life we ​​end up forgetting this, that's where Ribon comes in. You are there helping us to help. Beautiful work, always encouraging us to be engaged in this mission.
depoimentsSection.thirdDepoimentDescription: I believe that donating is very important as it is a way of bringing help to those who need it. With the donations we make through Ribon we have the chance to contribute to making bigger changes happen!

purchaseSection.title: Choose the best way to spread your daily love

boostSection.title: Your cause gets more
boostSection.subtitle: Total raised for your cause so far
boostSection.tip: By donating money through Ribon,you generate tickets so that other people can donate for free. With that, some of them are inspired to donate money too.

supportSection.title: Give us your opinion
supportSection.text: What did you think of this experience?

contributionSection.titleNewImpact: Thanks to you, {{nonProfitName}} will be able to impact 1 person. Thank you!
